name: Moogi The Forest Guardian (Rubber Duckies Studio, Bjellen, MiaBrg, Desmoura, PigeonGoodie)
name_original: Moogi The Forest Guardian (Rubber Duckies Studio, Bjellen, MiaBrg, Desmoura, PigeonGoodie)
description: Experience two beautiful stories through the eyes of a magical forest ranger in a 2d side-scroller platformer game. Reveal Moogi's past and help him find his missing children through a magical forest. Use Moogi's whistle to make plants grow, enemies sleep, and find the forest's true self!
